title: Nu-7 "Hammer Down"

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, select a player with the rest of the Nu-7 "Hammer Down" members. That person is attacked. If a vote is inconclusive, a random player voted is attacked.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: All MTF Members are Nu-7 "Hammer Down" if this is selected.

desc:
Post 4483
*" All remaining survivors are advised to remain in the evacuation shelter or any other safe area until the unit has secured the facility. "*
